planning.rationale: A CALL FOR PROFESSIONAL SERVICE PROVIDERS TO SUBMIT PROPOSALS FOR HEALTH AND SAFETY PROFESSIONAL SERVICES UNDER THE INTEGRATED SECURITY SYSTEM PROJECT AT DRAKENSTEIN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY IN THE WESTERN CAPE.On behalf of the Department of Correctional Services, Independent Development Trust hereby calls for professional health and safety service providers to submit proposals for HEALTH AND SAFETY PROFESSIONAL SERVICES TO UNDERTAKE WORKS FOR THE SECURITY INSTALLATIONS TO THE PERIMETER FENCE, SALLY PORT AND CONTROL ROOM BUILDINGS AT DRAKENSTEIN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY IN THE WESTERN CAPE.Tender documentation is available on the IDT website: www.idt.org.za/business-opportunities/current-tenders

budget.description: THE INTEGRATED SECURITY SYSTEM PROJECT AT DRAKESTEIN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY IN THE WESTERN CAPE - A CALL FOR PROFESSIONAL SERVICE PROVIDERS TO SUBMIT PROPOSALS FOR HEALTH AND SAFETY PROFESSIONAL SERVICES UNDER THE INTEGRATED SECURITY SYSTEM PROJECT AT DRAKENSTEIN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY IN THE WESTERN CAPE.On behalf of the Department of Correctional Services, Independent Development Trust hereby calls for professional health and safety service providers to submit proposals for HEALTH AND SAFETY PROFESSIONAL SERVICES TO UNDERTAKE WORKS FOR THE SECURITY INSTALLATIONS TO THE PERIMETER FENCE, SALLY PORT AND CONTROL ROOM BUILDINGS AT DRAKENSTEIN CORRECTIONAL FACILITY IN THE WESTERN CAPE.Tender documentation is available on the IDT website: www.idt.org.za/business-opportunities/current-tenders
